/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky.
